name: Craig Kopra
text: We were here on a Monday night.   The service was great and very friendly.  In retrospect, the stuffed crust pizza could have been better as it was pretty thin and little sauce; still enjoyable though.  Next time should I be back in Watkins Glen I will be more than happy to return to Pizza Hut.
